section.p: The adverse and other adverse reactions section shall contain a narrative description of the substance intolerances and the associated adverse reactions suffered by the patient.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Alerts Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.2)
SHALL conform to CCD Alerts Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.2)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)

[CCD] SHOULD contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)
[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing "alert" and/or "allergies and adverse reactions".
[CCD] SHALL satisfy: The absence of known allergies, adverse reactions or alerts SHALL be explicitly asserted.
